chapter.title: First login to SASKE
chapter.para: SASKE uses Kerberos5 for athentification and user can change its password via web interface located here. When you access this web page one should see following window. One should enter own username.

note.para: SASKE username is same as your mail username, eg. mvala@saske.sk has 'mvala' username.

warning.para: Currently, we are not synchronized with password database, used by mail and one need to create new password. Note that this password is not changed for mail service.

chapter.para: If user cannot login at given web page, user can ask for "first" password by sending mail to mvala@saske.sk or ingrid@saske.sk and one time password will be sent to user. This passwork can be used for first login and system will ask to change password. User should use this "new" password for our services like indico, eos, and others. List of the services is available at .

When login is successful, user will enter his new password and click "Reset password and Login" button.
